summary: Interviews, archival footage and home movies are used to illustrate a social history of folk artist and activist Pete Seeger.
cast: Joan Baez|Johnny Cash|Bill Clinton|Bob Dylan|Ronnie Gilbert|Arlo Guthrie|Lee Hays|Fred Hellerman|Martin Luther King|Leadbelly|Natalie Maines|Roger McGuinn|George Pataki|Tom Paxton|Paul Robeson|Tao Rodriguez-Seeger|Daniel Seeger|Mika Seeger|Pete Seeger|Tinya Seeger|Toshi Seeger|Dick Smothers|Tom Smothers|Bruce Springsteen|N. Paul Stookey|Mary Allin Travers
title: Pete Seeger: The Power of Song
